title: PHPincludeKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPincludeKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example Use include to add a footer to a page:

Welcome to my home page!

Some text.

Some more text.

Definition and Usage The include keyword is used to embed PHP code from another file. If the file is not found, a warning is shown and the program continues to run. Related Pages The include_once keyword The require keyword The require_once keyword Read more about including files in our PHP Include Files Tutorial . ★ +1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPincludeKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPincludeKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPincludeKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
